website_summaries.verdict: One of the best options for a gentle calf massage right from the comfort of your home.
pros: The leg wraps are easy to adjust and slip on around the calves in a short amount of time
Comes with several different massage settings
cons: Smaller leg wraps may not fit over large or swollen legs without additional help

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Restless Leg Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe Restless Leg Syndrome and ordered these looking for relief. Used them for the first time last night and slept better than I have in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLey

customer_reviews.title: Help with lazy leg/circulation issues.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this product as I've been having some circulation issues lately. First day using it and love it! Has 2 modes to choose from. Focus on upper leg, mid calf and feet. It compresses as tightly as possible. Then it decompress leaving my legs and feet feeling relaxed. This last about 10-15 minutes then auto shut off. Ordered yesterday, received product today. Priced right, then received a 20% off at check out. One of the most satisfied purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Won't He Do IT!

customer_reviews.title: helpful for edema swelling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who found that using and exhausting herself fighting to put on compression stockings...these are an easy solution that she can use. And they didn't hurt her because she could adjust it. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and am still learning how to use it. It does compress feet and upper calves, not so much ankles and lower calves, but this could be my error. I do have an issue with the controller, it does not show it is charging g when I plugged it in out of the box. An hour later, it hadn’t charged at all. It did function when plugged in during use, but I don’t know if it will hold a charge. I also have the model that just compresses lower legs, and I love that device. So far this one is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: debzstuff

customer_reviews.title: My dad loved it !!
customer_reviews.text: My dad is diabetic and he need the leg message almost everyday. This product is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: PRIT SONI

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would help increase blood circulation to these areas. This product really fits the bill. It is easy to use. I usually use the mode that does the feet first and then the calves ,With a 10 minute break in between. I have only used it for four days so far but am already feeling some relief from the pain and stiffness. Not sure it will be a full cure but this is the next best thing and it is drug free. I also have been exercising which helps a lot. This products is a great addition to my routine. A post exercise medical treatment you can do while reading or watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Compression great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, a little nervous about remote shaking when the compression stops but let see
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Really good product that can significantly reduce the stress on the leg
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as it greatly reduce the stress I have on the legs after I stay for a long period of time in a day. Easy to use after I follow the instructions. The modes selections from the product is a plus because it is really user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work so well to take swelling out of legs. It is so worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Those with Limited Mobility
customer_reviews.text: This air massager is ideal for improving circulation for someone with limited mobility. It is easy to use and effective. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: These hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea however these hurt! They are supposed to help relieve pain and help with circulation, they flat out hurt when compressing, tried to loosen the Velcro and that does not help! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: maureen utzerath

customer_reviews.title: Swelling gone
customer_reviews.text: Helped me when I had a bout with chf swelling in legs , it works and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Mustang05

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lupus/muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: Lupus patient: great for the muscle pain, nerve pain and aching joints. I have a high tolerance for pain and the strength and pressure of this is grear. If I could change anything, I would have gotten the thigh high one.
customer_reviews.author: LASONYA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the job that is doing..
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: These are even better than the ones they use in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: These are even better than the ones they use in the hospital. I had some swelling in my legs due to an allergic reaction to some HP Meds. Happy to say that is not a problem anymore. These are AMAZING! Come professionally wrapped and packaged too. KUDOS to the SELLER! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!!!!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: LibbyO

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I suffer from restless leg syndrome at night and sore calves and feet, so this is just perfect! Level 3 is intense so I stay with level 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have a back massager, this leg massager is perfect completion after a crazy day with my LO. I thought it would be huge and heavy before I purchased it, but it’s actually light and powerful. There are three intensities, level 2 is perfect for me. My LO said I look like a robot when I’m using it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT I PURCHASED IN 2019
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my trip to Bali. 12+ hour flight- so the leg massagers were a blessing. I still use them to this day and they are a wonderful option when I am sore after working out. BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.author: Lbgr8

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this everyday sometimes twice a day since I got it. Helps with achy feet. I have skinny calves and this worked great didn't have to put the velcro tight kept it where it should be and was perfect amount of pressure for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  & Jackie Crofts

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty good for the price. Takes a little experimenting to get the best effect.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie Craig

customer_reviews.title: incorrect buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my ankle injury,wanted it to help with swelling. I was advised against them by my pt. Good for restless leg syndrome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with compression
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to use, but a how to video would be a major plus. It did feel good once I figured out the setting and tightness I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Furby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a gift and the motor does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought is for a gift for my 70 year old mom. It was on sale so when I gave it to her, it was past the return window. She opened it, we set it up and the it just clicks with no compression. My brother said it was probably a defective motor, since you can here it clicking when you turn it on. I contacted the company 3 days ago and am awaiting a response. So we will see...and I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: It massages the legs great!
customer_reviews.text: It took a minute to figure out how to put them on my legs. I really like how they squeezed my calfs, but I particularly purchased them for my feet. The left side squeezed both my calf and foot (not as tight as I would of like), but the right side did not squeeze my foot at all. I kept them on for about 30mins and nothing. So I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: LaChanz Cousar

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work out for me! It squeezed my calf's way to much had to send it back !
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have several issues with my legs due agent orange exposure. It helped with circulation and relieved the pain. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Bietz

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. It helps keep the neuropathy pain at bay.
customer_reviews.author: ShaVegas Atiya

customer_reviews.title: Look for other options !!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered late but also I was very disappointed with the remote. It is not really a remote but a wired remote. You have to have a power source to plug it in. There are no massage balls or stuff inside but it just press against your legs with pressure setting s so product descriptions are misleading. Please look for other options
customer_reviews.author: Sachib

product_meta.title: Naipo Leg Air Massager for Foot and Calf Massage Leg Wraps with Handheld Controller 3 Intensities 2 Modes
feature_bullets: FOOT AND CALF MASSAGE - This leg massager press your calves and feet muscle to loosen stiffness muscles and relieving fatigue.
2 MODES AND 3 LEVELS OF INTENSITY - Choose a setting by the handheld controller that works best for you for an optimal relaxation experience.

WIDE SIZE APPLICABLE - The foot and calf massager is made from durable fabric and you can easily adjust it for your size. It fits for calf circumference from 15 inches to 21inches. Foot size 11 inches.
CORDED DESIGN - The corded design allows for consistent power all the time. DC12V/1A UL plug adapter is provided to use.
15 MINUTES OFF - The leg wraps shut off automatically after 15 minutes of use. You need to turn it on again if needed.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
